comment: Course is designed to prepare YA for the business world by practicing interview skills, reflecting on your choice of major/career path, & resume building. Easy to finish everything with plenty of time between assignments. Attendance to events are encouraged but not mandatory.  Professor is responsive & sends exceptionally clear email communications

This class is a very easy course, consisting of 10 assignments, it is pass fail so you have to do them all on time! She was very quick with emailing. If you wanted to, you could do all the assignments in one week and be done for the semester, or space them out, it's your choice. As long as it's done by the due date she doesn't care! She was easy!

I took her BUSA 2100 for credit, either pass or fail. The class itself is very easy, you have 10 assignments you have to complete to get credit for the class. Mrs. Womack provides opportunities to make up assignments + cares for her students. However, even if you take this course online, be prepared to show up to at least 2 in person assignments.
